instructions: Open Settings . In the left panel, tap either Passcode , Touch ID & Passcode , or Face ID & Passcode , depending on the iPad model. Enter the passcode. In the Passcode Lock screen, tap Require Passcode . Don't see these settings on the screen? If you have iPad Unlock turned on for Touch ID or Face ID , you can't delay the interval. Instead, rest your finger on the Home button or raise the phone and look at it to unlock the iPad. In the Require Passcode screen, select a setting from Immhhediately up to 4 hours .
